featured.text: Currently, health care costs account for __(37)__ twelve percent of the gross domestic product.
At Happy Puppy, your dog can enjoy a half day of care and then be taken to the salon at naptime.
Under the new doctor’s care, the regular testing stopped and Mrs. Power’s condition stabilized.
A new relationship is like an embryo that requires time, care and attention to grow into whatever may evolve.
The couple was spending about $30,000 a year for her care.

other.text: 19 Happy Puppy is a relatively new service, we benefit from more than 20 years of experience in breeding and caring for dogs.
Mr. Power then spoke with his own primary care doctor, who advised him to find a new specialist to oversee Mrs. Power’s care.

They were quite right, for my father cared 40 about who did what to whom.

definition.en_def: The feeling of concern or interest for someone or something; the act of providing for someone's needs.
definition.example: She showed great care for the injured bird.
